about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Vishwas Agri Seeds Limited is in the business of processing and supplying seeds to farmers via the distribution network. The company sells its seeds under the brand name "Vishwas". Vishwas Agri Seeds Limited's product portfolio includes crop seeds for Groundnut, Soybean, Wheat, Cumin, Green Gram, Black Gram Research Hybrid seeds for Cotton, Castol, Pearl Millet, Maize, hybrid vegetable seeds Chilli, Tomato, Brinjal, Watermelon, Sweet Corn, cabbage, Onion, Coriander Seeds, Fenugreek, Mustard, Lucern, Carrot, etc

Vishwas Agri Seeds Limited's commercial operations of seed processing unit along with Warehouse & Cold storage facility is located in Bavla, District: Ahmedabad, Gujarat.

As of March 31, 2023, the company has produced seeds for more than 40 different field crops and vegetables.

Vishwas Agri Seeds Limited have a presence in Gujarat, Maharashtra, and Rajasthan. Vishwas has more than 75 varieties of Crops.

The company has 18 employees who look after the marketing & sales of the products.

Competitive Strengths:

  1. Integrated Seed processing unit with cold storage and warehouse facility in one premise.
  2. Wide range of products backed by consistent quality.
  3. Experienced Promoter supported by dedicated Management team.

faqs.question: What is the Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO?
faqs.answer:
Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹86 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on March 21, 2024, and closes on March 26, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO opens on March 21, 2024 and closes on March 26, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO?
faqs.answer: Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,37,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO will be done on Wednesday, March 27, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, March 28, 2024. Check the Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Vishwas Agri Seeds IPO listing date is on Monday, April 1, 2024.
